author: Staff Reporter
text:
Four children were affected by chicken pox at Kabilakurichi village in Paramathi Velur here on Tuesday.

They were found with symptoms of fever, headache and body pain after which they were taken to a nearby hospital.

Doctors confirmed that they were suffering from chicken pox. On Tuesday, a mobile medical team also screened villagers for chicken pox. They were asked to approach the nearest Primary Health Centre if found with symptoms.
title: Four children affected by chicken pox
